add_site.description: Adds a site to the set of the user's sites in Search Console.

delete_site.description: Removes a site from the set of the user's Search Console sites.

list_sitemaps.description: List all your sitemaps for a given site

list_sites.description: Lists the user's Search Console sites.

search_analytics.description: Query traffic data for your site using the Google Search Console API.

props.name: startDate
props.description: The start date of the date range to query (in YYYY-MM-DD format).

props.name: endDate
props.description: The end date of the date range to query (in YYYY-MM-DD format).

props.name: dimensions
props.description: The dimensions to group results by. For example: ["query", "page", "country", "device", "searchAppearance", "date"].

props.name: filters
props.description: Optional filters to apply to the data. Filters can be used to restrict the results to a specific subset.

props.name: dimension
props.description: The dimension to filter by (e.g., query, page, country, device).

props.name: operator
props.description: The filter operator to apply (e.g., equals, contains).

props.name: expression
props.description: The expression to compare the dimension against.

props.name: aggregationType
props.description: How data is aggregated. Options include "auto", "byPage", "byProperty".

props.name: rowLimit
props.description: The maximum number of rows to return.

props.name: startRow
props.description: The first row to return. Use this parameter to paginate results.

submit_sitemap.description: Submits a sitemap for a site.

urlInspection.description: Use the URL Inspection action to check the status and presence of a specific page within Google's index.
